item.title: Green Chilli – Flavoured Cashewnuts
item.dc:creator: admin_vinoth
item.description: A common misconception, cashews do not make you fat! In fact , their healthy goodness can be reaped by eating a few everyday. Cashew nuts are a boon, loaded with vitamins and minerals, including zinc, that supports healthy blood circulation and immune system function. The high copper content helps prevent blood diseases too. A great source of dietary fibres, this nut is tiny but mighty!
item.content:encoded:
Green Chilli flavoured Kaju-Cashew Nuts From Aanandh Flavoured cashews.

Also Called As ‘Jeedi Pappu’ in Telugu & ‘Kaju’ in Hindi.

This is a Vegetarian product from our local farmers and processed at PANRUTI, Cuddalore Dist, Tamil Nadu.
‘Panruti’ is one of the best places for Cashew Nuts. Grown locally and available in fried variant and boiled variant.

Brand: Aanandh  Flavoured Cashews
Ingredient type: vegetarian
Shelf life: 6 months
Ingredients: cashew / Kaju
Specialty: no artificial flavor. no preservatives

Other names as ‘Munthiri Paruppu’ (Tamil), ‘Andiparippu’ (Malayalam), ‘Geru Beeja’ (Kannada) And ‘Kaju’ (Gujarati) Are
Full Of Anti-Oxidants, Vitamins, And Minerals Which Are Required For The Normal Functioning Of The Body.

Minimum Order Quantity(MOQ): 1 Kg ( 1000 Grams)

Other Information:

Manufactured & Marketed by Vintage Farmers under the brand name of “Shree Sai Cashews”.

For Queries/Feedback/Complaints:

Email: cashewcornerstore@gmail.com
